attributes.action: create a personal petrol allowance for every driver in the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would be a much fairer
system than the current suggestion of road pricing.  Every driver would have a personal petrol allowance (eg 1500 gallons, approximately 5000 miles) with which they would buy petrol at a certain rate. Once over that amount, petrol costs would rise sharply. This would encourage people to think about whether a car journey is actually necessary, whilst at the same time taking into account that some driving is unavoidable.  This seems a better way of reducing pollution. If you use your car sensibly you will not be penalised~however, if you choose to drive over your allowance, you will pay a higher rate for the privilege. This would also encourage people to make their next car purchase a more economical alternative.  
I would propose that each person is
given a card that has to be swiped when purchasing petrol as a means of keeping track of how much has been used (thus alleviating the need for expensive and intrusive tracking devices).
